title: Mardi Gras season kicks into high gear with 1st parade
title_page: Mardi Gras season kicks into high gear with 1st parade | Daily Mail Online
text:
Mardi Gras season kicks into high gear with 1st parade
NEW ORLEANS (AP) — Mardi Gras season is kicking into high gear in New Orleans with the first of the city's major parades this weekend.
Mardi Gras is the city's biggest tourist attraction, where hundreds of thousands of people gather to watch parades and floats that organizations known as krewes have spent months planning and decorating
The Krewes of Oshun and Cleopatra, an all-female group, parade down the avenue Friday evening, throwing beads to onlookers.
